author: agemanning
content:
Hey all! This PR discusses some potential ways forward about how we can standardize our libp2p stack for an initial libp2p testnet: https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/1281

There are some decisions being made and I'm conerned there is not enough involvement from all teams. If you have any spare time, could you have a look over this and share your opinion on this. Even if you hate it and prefer to go a different path, this way we can iterate :).
